body_html:
You're probably using the wrong python binary that does not correspond with your pip binary used for tf installation.
For MacOS this is usually a PITA with the built-in python and pip in /usr/bin/ and other ones from brew,macports,virtualenvs,etc. Make perfectly sure they match.
body_text:
You're probably using the wrong python binary that does not correspond with your pip binary used for tf installation.
For MacOS this is usually a PITA with the built-in python and pip in /usr/bin/ and other ones from brew,macports,virtualenvs,etc. Make perfectly sure they match.
body:
You're probably using the wrong python binary that does not correspond with your pip binary used for tf installation.
For MacOS this is usually a PITA with the built-in python and pip in /usr/bin/ and other ones from brew,macports,virtualenvs,etc. Make perfectly sure they match.
